text: al-Shifāʾ (الشفاء), sometimes ash-Shifa, is the Arabic for healing. It may refer to: *Al-Shifa' bint Abdullah, a companion of Muhammad *dār al-shifāʾ, house of healing, a hospital :*Al-Shifa Hospital in Gaza :*Al-Shifa pharmaceutical factory, active in Khartoum between 1997 and 1998 *Kitab al- Shifa, Book of Healing :*The Book of Healing by Avicenna :*Kitab ash-Shifa bi ta'rif huquq al-mustafa by Qadi Ayyad :*Kitab al-Shifa by Ibn al-Rāhib
title: Al-Shifa (disambiguation)
